inn1.comm: shortish on leg stump, tries to whip it fine, gets a leg-bye, bowled at 137kmph
nipped back in from short of a good length, struck Smith in the midsection there as it came back in, god bounce for the big man

Mix-up, but Amla is safe, the throw should have gone to the non-striker's end, Amla called for a single after Smith knocked it towards point, Hafeez picked it up but Smith was slow to react to Amla's call, Hafeez threw to the wrong end, though
slightly short of a good length, Amla gets on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
pitched on a length this time, pushes it wide of mid-on where Gul dives to keep them down to a single
goodish length on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards the bowler
drops it short and Amla seizes the length early, rocks on the back foot and pulls it away hard past midwicket for a boundary
short of a good length, rocks on the back foot and pushes it back towards the bowler
goodish length outside off and he lets that one through to the keeper, holds its line
nipped back in from middle, struck very high on the pads, on the thigh in fact, as Amla tried to whip that square, an appeal from Junaid turned down
in the corridor outside off, bowled at 142kmph, shoulders arms to that one
nips back in from leg stump, tries to whip it fine, gets it down again towards fine leg
short of a good length, that was leaving the right hander, bowled at 144kmph, cracked off the back foot towards third man for a single
bowled on a length outside off at 142.6kmph, leaves that one alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and shows the full face to the bowler
shortish on the off, gets across and knocks it down in front of midwicket
shortish outside off and he's found the gap, not great timing but he gets a couple, crunching that past a diving point into the deep
width and he cashes in, short of a good length, he stands back and punches that between point and cover for a boundary
superbly timed, just a punch, gets on the back foot and imparts plenty of force despite a minimum of effort, Jamshed gives chase and drags it back in, three more to the score
Smith shuffles across, takes it from the off stump and clips it towards fine leg for a single
slightly down the leg side, gets a leg-bye trying to whip that one fine
short of a good length on the off, gets back and taps it down into the leg side
followed that after it was pitched a little short outside off, punched between cover and point for a couple of runs
short ball and it's been dispatched, easily, just rolls his wrists over that one and pulls it behind square for a boundary, stylishly done by Amla

that's out, big sound, good length this time and Amla chased that one, not much footwork there, just went hard at that one, aiming to crack it through cover, appeared to get a thin inside edge there and Akmal took it easily, Irfan has struck

appeal for a catch and it's been turned down, Misbah wants a review, Kamran Akmal was convinced but Irfan went up belatedly, landed on a good length, he opted to play that off the back foot, there was a sound as it went past the bat, but Hot Spot doesn't show any heat signature there. It wasn't the bat hitting pad either, because there was no contact between those two. There was a sound, but was there any compelling evidence that there was a touch? Dharmasena is the third umpire and he reckons the sound is good enough to change the decision, even though Hot Spot didn't reveal anything. Hmm, it's been given out.
in the channel outside off and he leaves that one alone to the keeper
ooh, a snorter, short of a length and AB was surprised by the bounce, was caught in two minds, whether to evade or play it, confused in the end and he just got out of the way in time
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards midwicket
slightly short, Smith gets well outside the line to defend it back to the bowler
short of a length, tries to slash that through point, misses but Bowden calls it a wide
pitched on a length this time and Smith mistimes a drive towards mid-off
short of a good length outside off, knocks that one down towards point from the crease
shortish on middle and leg, Smith whips that hard through square leg, that's his strength, four more, fine leg is too wide to cut that one off
driven on the up, bowled on a good length, straight towards mid-off
smacked away, crunched that between extra cover and mid-off, short of a good length and he slapped that well between those two fielders

edged and gone! No doubts about this one, de Villiers was again in two minds about this, short outside off and he belatedly decided to go for it, tried to guide him past the slips there but got a thick edge and second slip snapped that with no trouble, three down now and South Africa in a bit of trouble
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and defends it towards the bowler
shortish outside off and he shoulders arms to let it through to the keeper
ooh, what was Faf doing there? Tried to pull that short delivery through square leg, just missed it, went over the bat
pitched on a length and that's been pushed past mid-off for three runs, well timed
trying to get him to drive, on a good length outside off, he leaves that one alone to the keeper
fuller this time and Faf doesn't waste it, leans forward and cracks that between mid-off and extra cover for a boundary
short of a good length, gets on the back foot, takes his bottom-hand off and plays it back to the bowler
steps forward and eases that between mid-off and extra cover for a single

Smith goes as well, he's not going to review it, he's walking back, short ball outside off and Smith tried to pull it square, got a faint nick and Kamran took it comfortably, a slight under-edge and he's gone as well
back of a length outside off and he gets out of the way
mid-off is wide and that was in the slot for Faf, pitched up and he just pushes that through the line for a boundary
held it back a little there, bowled at 139.3kmph, leaves that one alone to the keeper
slightly short outside off and he leaves that one be to the keeper
bowls on a good length, rocks forward and stabs that towards extra cover
goodish length, rocks forward and plays that on the up towards mid-off
nipped back in from middle, took his bottom-hand off as he fended that away towards fine leg for a single
good length and wide, chases that one, goes hard at it, gets a thick edge well pas the slips and a diving Umar Gul at third man
knocked away off the front foot
bowled on a good length and it's pushed off the front foot towards cover
appeal for lbw, short of a good length and he tried to pull that over square leg, was struck high on the pads, on the thigh in fact, was too high, also pitched outside leg
steps forward to that one, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to defend
goodish length on middle, gets forward and pushes it towards mid-on
the boundaries are still flowing, short outside off and it's been smacked through point by Behardien, got on top of that one, was in the air for a while but it's safe
ooh, goes after that one, pushed it fuller this time and Behardien went after it, just went past the outside edge
lovely timing, poor ball, full on the pads and that's been driven with ease through midwicket for four more
dropped that really short outside off, and was wide as well, bowled at 143kmph, left alone and called a wide
short of a good length and he leaves that one alone to the keeper

ooh, superb delivery and he didn't have an answer to that one, failed to keep it down, bowled at 140kmph, dropped it short on middle and Behardien was up in the air as he tried to play that, just hung his bat in front of his face and hoped it didn't carry to a fielder

Faf goes, Irfan reacts well, extra bounce doing the trick again! Took off from short of a good length and surprised Faf, who came on the front foot and tried hard to keep it down, taking his bottom-hand off, but it got him on his glove and lobbed back towards the bowler, Irfan bent low and to his left and took it one-handed, five down now
shortish, turns in and catches him on the thigh as he tries to play it into the leg side
turns in from outside off, slightly short, gets an inside edge as he tries to push it into the leg side, a single
slightly short and he played it with an open face, getting it wide of the slips for a couple of runs
floating it on a good length on the off, gets a stride out and defends it to the bowler
angling it towards middle and he pushes it down into the leg side
plays it off the back foot, gets all the way back and works it behind square
angling in towards middle and leg, McClaren gets across and turns it towards mid-on
ooh, that seemed to swing in, almost yorker length on off and middle and he dug it out in time
nicely timed, on a good length and it's pushed firmly past the bowler and mid-off for a couple of runs
turns the face on that one, gets to the pitch and pushes it towards mid-on
short of a good length and it holds its line outside off stump, left alone to the keeper
good carry to the keeper, in the channel outside off and it's been left alone
Behardien continues to score, fetched that one from outside off and swept it hard through square leg for a boundary, there is a short leg in place
gets forward and plays that one towards midwicket, very gently
gets all the way on the back foot and works it through square leg for a single
risky shot from McClaren under the circumstances, shortish and he tries to paddle that fine, gets a top edge over the slips for a few runs, Younis gives chase
slowed it up, tossed up on the off stump, turns in and he plays it down in front of short leg
pushed it straighter on middle this time, defended towards short leg from the crease
short and wide and this doesn't bounce as much as he wanted, goes for the cut, misses
short and wide and McLaren is going for his shots, slaps that over point into the deep for a single
shortish on the off, bowled at 135.2kmph, whips it through square leg, Behardien wants the second, Nasir Jamshed strikes the stumps direct from deep square leg but Behardien is well in
nicely played, short of a good length, punched in front of deep point for a couple of runs
banged in short at 138.4kmph on leg stump, called a wide, he didn't have to duck
slightly short on the off, crunched wide of point for a single
short outside off, guides that one past a diving point wide of third man for a couple more runs
turns in sharply from outside off, worked away towards square leg
shortish on the off, turns in and he knocks it away into the off side
flighted on middle and off, gets forward and taps it into the leg side
slightly short, gets on the back foot and plays it wide of midwicket for a single
punched from the crease towards extra cover
quicker through the air, on leg stump and that's been defended back to the bowler
Behardien's lucky, nips back in from outside off and it cramped Behardien, who get an inside edge over the stumps to the fine-leg boundary
shortish on the off, pushed off the back foot towards mid-on for a quick single
in the channel outside off stump and he shoulders arms to that one
shortish outside off, run down towards third man for a single
shortish on middle, turns it away through square leg into the deep for a single
shortish on middle, turns it off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
ooh, tossed up and McLaren tried to drive that through extra cover, got a thin inside edge onto the pads
turns away and just goes past the outside edge, drew him forward and then spun away to just miss the bat
slightly short, crunched towards deep point for a single
gets forward and across and defends that straightish delivery towards midwicket
defends that in the vacant point region for a single
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot towards the bowler
senses a chance and takes it, short outside off from Gul and Behardien pulls him into that huge gap behind midwicket, raises the century for South Africa
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot, drops it in front of cover
goodish length and that's been pushed towards extra cover
shortish on middle and he pulls it behind square, fine leg runs around and cuts it off, they take a couple
slightly short on the off, bowled at 137.5kmph, gets on the back foot and pushes it to cover
short and it's pulled but straight to midwicket, Younis fields well and tries to throw down the stumps at the non-striker's end
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and defends that one to point
takes that one from outside off and whips it through midwicket for a couple of runs
fired it quick on middle, at 99.3kmph, gets a thick outside edge but along the ground and wide of slip
floating on the off, reaches forward and plays it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and works it through square leg for a single
sliding down leg, clips Behardien's pads on the way to short fine leg
down the leg side, tries to turn it fine, called a wide
tossed up on leg stump, driven but straight to midwicket

fired in towards middle and leg, McLaren goes for the sweep and misses, Hafeez has a word with Akmal and Misbah and Misbah has reviewed it, McLaren went hard at that one, was it missing leg? A bit of turn there, there was no bat involved, it seemed to be struck in line, though ball-tracking will confirm that. I don't think height was an issue there. Ooh, the ball-tracking says it would have hit the leg stump, but the outside half of leg stump, so it's the umpire's call. Really close. Could have gone either way, a good call for a review there

Given out this time, fires it quicker this time, appeared adjacent again, reaches forward to defend but that appeared to go straight on, seemed to strike him in line with middle and leg as he missed an attempt to block that, Pakistan have struck
pushed it full and he plays it towards extra cover
tossed up on the off, driven towards long-off for a single
pushes that one down towards long-on for a single
tossed up, that's been played back towards the bowler
short of a length outside off, crunched it towards deep point for a single
slightly short, gets on the back foot and turns it towards square leg
angling it towards middle, plays it towards long-on for a single
flighted on middle, plays it away in front of long-on for a single
a bit of width there, driven but straight to extra cover
gets forward, opens the face and plays it behind point for a couple of runs
flighted on middle, that's been driven back firmly but Hafeez does well, diving to his left to prevent a single
flatter on the off, steps forward and defends it to extra cover
more runs this time, quicker through the air, guided past first slip, behind point, for three runs
floating it on middle, pushes it past a diving midwicket for a single
plays that one away through cover into the deep for a single
gets front and across and turns that one away towards midwicket
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it towards midwicket
shortish outside off and that's cut away but straight towards point
that's been slapped hard, flighted and slow through the air, reaches for it and thwacks it through the extra-cover region for four more
lets that slightly quicker delivery through to the keeper
plays that one past the bowler towards long-on for a single
comes down the track to a flat delivery and plays it back to the bowler
pushes that just wide of mid-on for a single
flighted on the off, drives it down towards long-on for a single
pushes it wide of mid-on again for one more, easily done
flighted on the off, pushes it through the line towards mid-off for a single, Irfan gets across and cuts it off but they've picked a single comfortably
flighted on the off, that's been pushed back to the bowler
shortish on the off, bowled at 101kmph, punched towards cover
tries to turn it square, struck on the pads but that would have been sliding down
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and works it wide of short fine leg for a couple of runs
slightly short on middle, turns it wide of midwicket, Behardien wants the single but Peterson sends him back
works it away through square leg this time for a single
floating it on the off, pushes it into the off side
knocks away a single
plays that one away wide of cover for a single
slightly short, punched towards midwicket who fumbles and they sneak a quick single
shortish on the off, chops that one down towards point from the crease
seemed to keep a little low, punches that one back to the bowler
pushes that one back towards the bowler
tossed up on the off, driven straight towards extra cover
pushed away past extra cover into the deep for a single
gets on the back foot, that turns in from outside off, knocks it down into the leg side
gets back and turns it past square leg for a single
bowled on a good length, pushes it back towards the bowler
pushed it full on the off, played towards long-off for a single
knocked away into the leg side
shortish and that's been punched away past midwicket for a single
comes down the track, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to play it into the leg side
slightly short on the off, punched towards extra cover from the crease
pushes that off the front foot towards extra cover
shortish on the off, punched straight to extra cover
played away towards midwicket
shortish on middle, worked away behind short fine leg for a single
shortish on middle, worked away towards deep square leg for a single
turn for Afridi, gets him high on the bat as he tries to play it off the back foot, was a touch surprised by the bounce there
bowled that one full on middle, digs it out back towards the bowler
crunches that good length delivery towards extra cover
Peterson comes down the track and drives it towards long-on for a single
gets forward and plays that down to long-on as well for a single
inside edge onto the pads as he steps forward, Behardien calls for the single but Peterson rightly sends him back
comes down the track and hits it inside out over extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs, 150 up for South Africa
stepping out again and pushing it to midwicket, a fumble allows them another single
flat on the off stump, turns it towards square leg off the back foot
flighted outside off, tries to drive that forcefully through extra cover, gets an inside edge onto the pads
thinks of playing a paddle but then withdraws and allows it through to the keeper, was a touch too wide to play that shot
the googly, gets on the back foot and pushes it behind square for a single
gets forward and across and plays that straighter one towards midwicket
floating it on middle, much slower through the air, defended into the leg side
sliding down the leg side and it clips Behardien's pads as he tries to play that fine, beats short fine leg to the boundary
short of a length outside off and he mistimes a pull towards midwicket
nicely struck, slices it hard through point but deep point cuts it across, just the single in the end
short of a good length outside off, guides that one down to third man for a single
short and wide and he finds the gap this time, over point, huge gap between deep point and third man and he gets a boundary
short of a good length outside off, taps it away towards point
knocks that behind point for a comfortable single, Umar Akmal dives valiantly but can't prevent the single
floating it on the off stump, drops it towards point and decides against the single
shortish outside off, guides it towards short third man
defended off the front foot towards point, three dot balls
chops that one behind point and wide of short third man for a single
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it towards midwicket
good, quiet over, gets forward and plays it with the turn towards midwicket
that's four, he took a risk there, short and wide and he slashed hard at that one, got a thick edge wide of the keeper, got it much finer than he would have liked
short of a length outside off, cut away towards Afridi at deep point for just the single this time
slower one bowled short on middle, turns it behind square for a single
leading edge but that lands safe, Peterson closed the face too early there, was outside leg stump and he tried to turn it square, did it early and he was lucky it didn't carry to mid-on
short and wide, slashed down towards third man for a single
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it to point
slightly short outside off, chops it down to short third man for a single
moving around the crease is Behardien, that's been playing to square leg, no single on offer there
gets on the back foot and punches that wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle and off, gets on the back foot and defends to cover
angling towards leg stump, pushes it away towards midwicket
kicks that one away, defends but the ball rolls back towards the stumps and he kicks it away just in time, close one that
shortish on middle, turned away towards square leg
can't beat square leg again, played straight to the fielder
Behardien's gone, shortish from Hafeez and he tried to clear deep square leg, was slightly short and he pulled it high but couldn't get the distance
tossed up and that's been driven hard through extra cover for a boundary, lovely timing
shortish but down the leg side and it's called a wide
clips the pads as he tries to work that one away
gets on the back foot and plays it through midwicket into the deep for a single
Ajmal strikes, a leading edge, don't think he picked the straighter one there, or it may have been a doosra, closed the face on that one and offered a simple catch to mid-off running to his left
short of a length outside off, punched towards deep cover for a single
turns in from outside off and it strikes him outside the line as he tries to defend
gets forward, to the pitch and defends him into the off side
gets well across and that slides down the leg side, given a wide by Bowden
appeal for lbw, did that strike him outside the line? Got across to play it into the leg side, may have struck in line, was it too high? Close shout
angling in towards leg, dropped in the direction of midwicket and he sets off for a single
flighted on the off, gets it wide of short third man for a single
gets front and across and defends that one towards midwicket
ooh, turned down the leg side, not called a wide, may have been a deflection off the pads
this time it's been signalled a wide, turns down the leg side by a fair distance
lands on the off and turns down leg, called another wide, Hafeez isn't happy

given him out, Steyn reviews it, the height may be an issue, turns in from outside off and rapped him high on the pads as he moved across, the umpire gave it out. Turned a fair distance, did it miss leg? Ball-tracking says that was missing leg. Not out.
tossed up on the off, Steyn gets forward and defends it towards midwicket
pushes it away into the leg side
slid that one in quicker on the off, shortish outside off and it's chopped towards point
flighted on the off, drops it in front of point for a single
reaches forward and defends that one solidly into the off side
turns down the leg side from the off stump and it's called a wide
Ajmal goes round the wicket, turns in and raps him really high on the pads as he comes forward to defend
pushes that one off the front foot towards extra cover
slightly short on leg stump, drops it in the direction of square leg and sets off for a single
drops that one short outside off and Steyn gets out of the way of that one
angling in towards middle and leg, gets an inside edge onto the pads and sets off for a single
slides on the pads, tries to clip him square, gets a leg-bye in the end
yorker length on the off and Steyn manages to dig it out towards midwicket
bowled'im! On a length and Steyn tries to push that through the line, he remains on nought after all that, misses and is bowled
bowled on a length and he pushes it back to the bowler
Peterson falls, South Africa have been bowled out, tries to drag it from well outside off over midwicket, Ajmal had slowed it up, gets a top-edge and it's an easy catch to short third man

inn2.comm: short of a good length, nipped back in a little from outside off, gets on the back foot and defends it in front of the bowler
slightly short on the off, rocks on the back foot and plays it to cover, bowled at 132.1kmph
lovely shot, on the up, goodish length outside off and he absolutely caressed that through extra cover for a boundary
short of a good length outside off, 135.2kmph, leaves that one alone to the keeper
short of a good length outside off, jabs that wide of midwicket for a single, McLaren dives full length to his right but can't prevent the run
on a good length on the off, a bit of away movement, gets forward and shows the full face to the bowler
goodish length and it nips away after pitching, just going past the outside edge as he presses forward
pitched up and that's struck hard but straight to the cover fielder
short of a good length outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
slightly short, punched off the back foot towards covetr
angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and plays it back towards the bowler
pitched on a length, goes for the drive but gets an inside edge onto the pads
ooh, some late movement there for Steyn, Hafeez came forward to defend that, too his bottom-hand off as he played that a little awkwardly
goodish length and nipping away, gets on the back foot and taps it away towards cover
pushed it on a good length, opens the face and plays it towards point
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and taps it towards point
slightly short outside off, moving away and he lets it through to the keeper
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and whips it through square leg for a single
gets across to that incoming delivery and pushes it back towards the bowler
nicely played but straight to mid-off, on a good length, he strode forward and connected sweetly
short ball outside off and he pulls him over midwicket, McLaren is the fielder giving chase, he slides and then drags the ball together with him over the ropes
short and wide and Hafeez smashes that one, he slashes that hard over the point boundary, struck it superbly and it went over the ropes
goodish length outside off, pushes it through extra cover for a single
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards point
slightly short outside off, crunches it into the ground towards extra cover
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and plays it with a slightly open face towards point
banged it short and Hafeez tackled it well, pulling it in front of midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
too quick for Hafeez, bowled at 141kmph, Steyn has a word or two to tell Hafeez, reminds him of how he tormented him during the Tests, banged in short again and Hafeez went for the pull and missed
gets forward and guides that one soundly towards point
sliding on the pads, tries to work it away square, clips the pads and they steal a single
in the corridor and Hafeez lets that one go through to the keeper
angling away, bowled on a good length, follows that one and plays that towards point
takes off from a good length and he shoulders arms to that one
short of a good length on the off, drops it down in front of cover and sets off for a single
bowled on a good length, pushed gently past the bowler towards mid-on
short of a good length, that's cut through point, wide of third man, and they pick a couple

appeal for lbw, nipped back in from middle and rapped him on the pads, seemed like it would be going down leg, the South Africans have a discussion, they decide against the review, would have probably gone down leg, ball-tracking confirms it would have missed leg
short of a good length, guides it behind point for a single
shortish on the off stump, bowled at 131.9kmph, gets on the back foot and pushes it o cover
dropped, McLaren has put it down at cover, short and it's slapped hard by Hafeez, went quick to the man there, had to move a little to his left, seemed like a straightforward chance, he put it down
slightly short outside off, crunches it towards point from the crease
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it down the pitch
a couple more to Jamshed, cuts it behind point and wide of third man, kept it down and timed it well
a bit more width from McLaren, that's been guided down to third man for a single
short of a good length, played a little away from his body there, got a thick edge to third man for a single

Jamshed falls! Excellent catch at slip, a dismissal not too different from AB de Villiers' this afternoon, short of a length and he tries to guide it past the slip fielder towards third man, got a thick edge and found slip, who dived well to his left to pouch that one, Smith was the man
streaky start, short of a length and he tries to cut that, gets a thick edge past a diving first slip, didn't carry, was on the bounce but he couldn't stop that
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to point
holds its line, short of a good length and Hafeez lets that through to the keeper
on a good length, rocks forward and opens the face as he steers that towards point
well fielded at point, short of a length and that's cut well but du Plessis dives to his left at point to prevent any runs
pitched on a good length and that's been driven straight to mid-off
chases a wide delivery, reaches for it and slices it over point, just manages to get it above the infield there, four more to Hafeez
goodish length on the off, gets front and across and taps it towards cover
slightly short on the off, rocks on the back foot and pushes it to the bowler
short of a length on the off and he pulls it well over the infield, that's over midwicket for a couple of runs
short of a length and Kamran swivels and pulls it down towards fine leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, punches it off the back foot towards point
shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot and punches it towards mid-on
that's been smashed, a bit of width there and he took a couple of steps down the track and thrashed it through point for a boundary
shortish on the off and he drags it slightly wide of mid-on, can't get the single however
appeal for lbw, struck in line but that pitched outside leg stump, height was an issue as well, pitched comfortably outside leg stump
good bounce on that occasion, bowled at 132kmph, tried to slash that one over point, missed
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
bowled that short on middle and Hafeez is going for his shots, except that he doesn't connect there, tried to hook that but missed
angling in towards middle, gets a little across and pushes it back towards the bowler
that leaves the right-hander, on a good length, inducing him to drive and then nips away to just go past the outside edge
slides down the leg side this time, AB dives full length to his left, can't quite stop it, fine leg runs across and cuts it off
dropped that short just outside off and he decides to sway out of the way this time

Hafeez is lucky, that struck him high on the bat, dropped it short did McLaren and it caught Hafeez on the glove and lobbed up in front of the bowler but there was no way he was reaching that, painful blow for Hafeez, though
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and defends it towards cover
nips back in from the off stump, moves in sharply and raps him on the pads but that was probably going down leg as well, they decide against the review once again
Akmal immediately tries to improvise, gets down and paddles that fine for a couple of runs to bring up Pakistan's half-century
uppish, tossed up from round the wicket, played it in the air wide of point for a single
angling in towards middle, pushes it through midwicket for a single
short outside off, waits for it to turn away and slashes it hard past point, beats deep point to the boundary, sweetly struck
too close to cut it seemed but he was in control, that went on straight, he made a bit of room and chopped it behind point for three more runs
flighted on the off, driven through to deep extra cover for a single

aiming for the yorker, bowled full on the pads and it's flicked away behind square, Ingram runs to his right from deep square leg, dives and then drags it back in again, has managed to avoid contact with the ropes

Steyn has got rid of Hafeez again, that's the fifth time he's got him out this tour, on a length and Hafeez just chipped that through the line, midwicket was alert and dived to his left to catch that with a dive, Steyn gives Hafeez a send-off, Pakistan have lost their openers
angling in towards middle, gets forward and defends it into the off side
shortish outside off, knocks it down off the back foot towards point
forced it off the back foot but could not get it past point, shortish and Younis crunched it wel

kept it down, banged in short outside off and it seemed for a while he was going to upper-cut that but no, he kept it down and played it in between point and cover, du Plessis gave chase and hauled it back in but his hand had made contact with the rope just as he tried to drag it in, that's four
slightly short outside off, slaps it off the back foot towards deep extra cover
swept from middle towards deep backward square leg for a single

that's bowled! Kamran Akmal was tempted by that tossed up delivery, tried to swing it hard over midwicket, missed, was struck on the toe and the ball rolled back onto the stumps, Pakistan in a bit of trouble now, got an inside edge onto the toe, mid-on and mid-off were inside the circle
angled it in towards middle, gets a big stride out and defends it into the off side
floating it on the off stump, pushes it towards cover
angling in towards middle, gets forward and knocks it down into the off side
short of a good length on the off, knocks that one down towards point
slightly short on the off, rocks back and plays it towards extra cover
short and it's pulled a little uppishly but well wide of midwicket for a single
bangs it short outside off and he leaves that one alone to the keeper
goodish length, Misbah rocks forward and defends that one towards cover
banged in short on middle and Misbah ducks under that one
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards mid-on for a single
goodish length outside off, pushes it towards cover from the crease
Misbah takes the aerial route, doesn't connect well enough, flighted outside off, didn't get hold of it as he tried to hit it over extra cover, it landed safe though and they get a couple
floating it on the off stump, gets a stride out and defends him back to the bowler
reaches forward, there was a bit of turn there, defended to point
gets forward, covers the line well and plays it towards point
angling in towards middle and that's been pushed back to the bowler
rocks forward and taps it in front of the bowler, was thinking of a single but it's not there
shortish on the off, guides that one towards third man for a single
angling in towards middle and leg, turns that one down towards fine leg for a single
Younis gets a thick inside edge, landed on the side of the pitch and he thought of a single there but there wasn't one available
gets forward and opens the face to play it towards point, no run on offer there
gets a stride out and defends that one into the leg side
plays that inside out wide of extra cover for a single
gets across and clips it through square leg for a single
on a length, driven wide of extra cover towards long-off for a single

appeal for lbw and he's been given, Younis has reviewed it. Played across the line to that one, got across and tried to work it through square leg, missed, and was struck on the pads, angled in from round the wicket, did it miss leg stump? Struck the outside of the front pad, ball-tracking says the ball would have missed leg stump comfortably, that's not out
Younis fetches that from the off stump and sweeps it to deep square leg for a single
pitched up and that's square-driven towards deep point for a single
shortish on the off, keeps it down off the back foot while playing it to point
Misbah plays that well, short on middle, he rolled his wrists over that one and played it down to fine leg
pitched up on the off and that's been driven straight towards mid-off
driven on the up but it's fielded well by Ingram at extra cover who prevents the single
short of a length on the off, crunched towards deep cover for a single to keep strike
short of a good length, chops it down towards third man for a single
on a good length, Misbah gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, turns it towards square leg for a single, thinks of a second but it's not there
steps forward and defends that one towards point
short and Younis has pulled that stylishly but there is a deep square leg in place, just the single
Misbah sends back Younis who was more than halfway down the pitch, tried to pull that fine, got a glove to it, the keeper collects but Misbah just manages to send him back in time
on a length, gets forward and pushes it through to extra cover
slightly short outside off, runs that one down towards third man for a single
short of a good length outside off at 132.5, he's left that alone to the keeper
Misbah pulls that one well but straight to deep square leg for a single
nipped back in from a good length, got an inside edge onto the pads as he tried to play that
eases that one through the covers into the deep for a single
was in the air, short and wide, cut uppishly to third man for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, reaches forward to drive, gets an inside edge onto the pads
shortish outside off, that's been fumbled at gully, Smith couldn't stop that one and conceded a single

ooh, moved well across, missed run-out, Younis just got a bit of bat to it as he moved across to clip that, Behardien collected it at square leg as Misbah sent back Younis, took aim, and missed, Younis was well short of his ground
short ball outside off and he tried to chop that past point, missed it
angling in towards middle, played it in the vacant midwicket region for a single
uppish, short of a good length and he's cut that over point towards third man for a single
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards cover
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it towards point

Misbah connects superbly, that came from nowhere, turned out to be a length ball outside off, was in the slot and Misbah struck that clean through the line to smack it over the long-off boundary for six
pitched on a length again, this time he eases it through cover for a single
short and Younis drags that from outside off, strikes it really well, there is a deep square leg in place but this is struck too well for him to cut off, four more, an excellent over for Pakistan
shortish outside off, Misbah guides that behind point into the deep for a single
ooh, inside edge as he tries to drop that into the off side, gets a couple towards fine leg
fullish and that's been crunched straight to extra cover, can't get it past Amla
plays that with an angled bat as he chops it down towards point
goodish length, guides that nicely down to third man for a single, was a slower one
low full toss on the pads, tried to clip it fine, got a leg-bye in the end
slightly short on middle, turns it wide of midwicket for a single
finds the gap, went against the turn there, had made up his mind, took it from a good length and it seemed to turn away but he swung it hard over midwicket for a boundary
slower through the air, makes a bit of room and slaps that through point into the deep for a couple more

gone! Dismissed off a full toss, struck it too well, picked it from middle and swept it straight to Amla at deep square leg, this makes things more interesting, he was batting positively and he picked the right ball there but found the fielder
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and knocks it into the leg side
Malik steps out of the crease to that flat delivery on middle and defends it into the off side
pitched that on a length, Misbah reached forward and played it back to the bowler
full toss and Misbah will feel he missed out, could have clipped it fine, just a single to square leg is what he'll get
well down the leg side and that's a wide
angling in towards middle, gets across and pushes it towards mid-on
shortish on the off, drops it in front of point, thinks of a single but Misbah rightly decides against it
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and chops it down into the off side
slower one bowled full outside off, steers that one straight to point
tossed up on the off and he plays it towards cover
angling in towards middle and that's been played back to the bowler
Misbah makes room and then defends, towards point
makes room again and Peterson bowls it straight, defended to cover
tossed up on the off, takes it on the full, whips it to midwicket but can't beat the fielder
turns away as he reaches forward, gets it high on the bat and it lobs up into the off side, wide of extra cover, just the single and he keeps strike
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and chops it to point
on a length, gets forward and plays it back past the bowler down the pitch
full on the pads and that's been driven well, towards deep midwicket for a single
pitched up on the off and Malik drove it through the line but to mid-off
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it in front of point, no single on offer there
angling in towards middle, pushes it towards midwicket, tidy over there
Misbah connects superbly, flighted on the off and Misbah releases some pressure, launches that high and handsome over the bowler's head for a clean six
makes a bit of room and drops that in the direction of point
works it away wide of short fine leg off the back foot for a single
tossed up on middle, Malik tries to force it wide of mid-on for a single, off the mark
turns it into the leg side for a single
Malik rocks on the back foot and punches it towards mid-on for a single
shortish outside off, cuts it wide of third man for just the single
angling in towards middle, pushes that one wide of a diving midwicket for a single
on a length on middle and leg, Malik plays it straight to midwicket
slower one bowled short on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side
short of a length outside off and he lets that one go through to the keeper
drops it short and he plays it wide of the keeper for a single, just worked it past him
slower one bowled short outside off, drops that one down towards point
slides it down the leg side and Malik seizes the chance, clips that one really fine down the ropes for a boundary
poor ball again, down the leg side once more and Mlaik has to just help it on its way down the fine-leg boundary, nicely done
three in a row, Tsotsobe has something to say to Malik but it's futile, short and wide and Malik slashes hard, gets a thick edge to the third-man boundary
low full toss and Malik drives that straight to mid-on
short and wide, width from Tsotsobe and Malik rocks back to punch it hard through a packed in-field on the off side, a decisive over that, the pressure is off
angling in towards middle, turned past midwicket into the deep for a single
short and wide and it's cut away towards third man for a single
Fine leg is much squarer, Misbah's turn to score a boundary, sliding on the legs and that's been flicked to the fine-leg boundary
short of a length on middle, turns it towards Tsotsobe at fine leg for a single
short of a good length, worked away off the back foot behind square for a single
short of a good length, knocks it down into the off side in front of extra cover, appeared to come off the glove
picked the length early and dispatched it, short on middle, gets on the back foot and pulls it hard over the deep midwicket boundary, lovely strike
gets on the back foot and pushes it to long-on for a single
floating it full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
low full toss and that's been timed well, drives it down the ground past mid-on, McLaren runs across from long-off, dives to his right and cuts it off, but they still get a couple
makes room and defends that into the off side
full toss and he smacks that hard past midwicket, the field is vacant behind that man and it's four more, they're doing it quickly now
Malik kicks it away, short of a good length, defended it off the back foot, the ball rolled back towards the stumps and he kicked it away in time
edged, a thick outside edge down towards third man as he tried to play that off the back foot
hangs his bat out at that fullish delivery outside off and is beaten
short of a good length outside off, prods at that one and is beaten
back of a length outside off and he lets that one be
in the channel outside off stump and he has left that alone to the keeper
slightly short outside off, Malik knocks it down in front of point
back of a length outside off, plays it off the back foot towards point
that nipped away after pitching, good length and Malik was drawn forward to play at it, just went past the outside edge
shortish on middle, punches it off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
drops that short outside off, rocks on the back foot and guides it towards point
shortish outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
gets across to that straightish delivery bowled at 129.2kmph, defended into the leg side
short of a length outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
a bit of room there, guided it to point, Malik decided against the single and an overthrow got them one
short and wide and Malik cuts that over gully towards third man for a couple of runs
goodish length and that's been defended well towards point
getting a bit of away movement is Steyn, Malik rocks forward and defends that to cover
ooh, that caught him on the glove, took off as he tried to play it on the off side, was fortunate it landed safe in front of point
shortish outside off, cut away to third man for a single
drops that one from the crease in front of point and races off for a quick single
chops that one down towards point on the bounce
short of a good length, a bit of width there and he guides that one down to third man for a single
Malik tries to squeeze that down to third man as well but point gets in the way
outstanding shot, angling in towards middle and he lofted him straight over his head for a boundary, nicely done, just through the line
slower one bowled short, Misbah rolls his wrists over that one and plays it down towards deep square leg for a single to bring up his half-century
turned away behind square for a single
drops that one short and Misbah seeks that through to the keeper
That's been dismissed, pitched on a length, Misbah made room and absolutely hammered that over extra cover for a flat six
full toss on middle, turns it away towards deep square leg to level the scores
short of a good length, knocks that one down in front of point, Malik wants the single, Misbah says no
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and he pushes it back to the bowler
short and wide and he goes for the cut, misses, but Billy Bowden reckons its a wide and he calls it, Pakistan have won
